::Shadow Wing::

She whispered to him, "I don't know.  she just showed up and started 
helping.  I wlked over to Unitron to try to talk and I failed.  Then 
this bot tells me to stay put and she walked out there and started 
yelling at Unitron."

> "Thanks Wing, whos the bot discussing terms with the bad guy.? 
> Lunarpine spoke softly so he wouldn't be overheard.
